experiences.title: Peer Mentor
experiences.company: Faculty of Medicine Peer Mentorship Program
experiences.text: Supported a junior graduate student through their transition into graduate school. I helped them apply to teaching and research assistantships, as well as develop connections and access resources on campus.

experiences.title: Instructor
experiences.company: Vancouver Summer Program - Obstetrics and Gynecology
experiences.text: Presented a lecture on endometriosis and a lecture on the histology of the female reproductive system. Also, developed an afternoon interactive lab session on histology.

experiences.title: Guest Lecturer
experiences.text: Taught the urinary and respiratory units for the course: Introduction to Microscopic Human Anatomy (CAPS390).

experiences.title: Workshop Leader
experiences.company: Mini Med School, BC Children's Hospital Research Institute
experiences.text: Conducted a hands-on workshop session on laparoscopic surgery for high school students.

experiences.title: Workshop Leader
experiences.text: Described my research experience as a women in a STEM field to a group of female high school students, and ran a hands-on histology lab demonstration.

experiences.title: Research Experience (REX) Mentor
experiences.text: Provided undergraduate students at UBC with advice and support as they create a research project and poster to present at the Multidisciplinary Undergraduate Research Conference.

experiences.title: Teaching Assistant
experiences.text: Teaching Assistant for a course entitled: The Principles of Human Morphology II (ANAT215).
